headlines.description: AC Milan veteran Zlatan Ibrahimovic had a penalty saved but later scored as his side finished the Serie A season with a 3-0 win over Cagliari.
headlines.shortLinkText: Zlatan scores after missing penalty in Milan win over Cagliari

headlines.description: Inter Milan ended Atalanta's 19-match unbeaten run with a 2-0 away win on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Inter end Atalanta's long unbeaten run to clinch second place

headlines.description: Serie A champions Juventus suffered their first home league defeat for over two years when they finished the season by losing 3-1 against AS Roma.
headlines.shortLinkText: Serie A champions Juventus rest Ronaldo for finale in loss to Roma

headlines.description: Lazio forward Ciro Immobile equalled the Serie A scoring record for a single season when he was on target in his side's 3-1 loss at Napoli.
headlines.shortLinkText: Immobile equals Serie A scoring record in Lazio loss at Napoli
